name: wonder-skin

effect.x-y: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.

short_effect: Lowers incoming non-damaging moves' base accuracy to exactly 50%.

flavor_text.x-y: Makes status moves more likely to miss.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Makes status moves more likely to miss.
